p: NL conceived, revised and wrote the main sections of the manuscript. PW collected literature and wrote the RT-PCR technology sections of the manuscript. XW collected literature and wrote the antibody detection technology sections of the manuscript. CG and JC collected literature and wrote the genomic characteristics and potential molecular diagnostic targets of 2019-nCoV. YG conceived the project and supervised the writing of the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
